summary: Medical case management system with dashboard, case tracking, and task management
architectural_notes: System includes dashboard with case cards
Cases contain MRN, name, and task tracking
Authentication migrating from Internet Identity to username/password

existing_features.title: Add a PDF export button to the dashboard view that generates a downloadable PDF report of all cases
Format the PDF report as a table or card layout displaying all case fields including MRN, owner name, pet name, species, breed, sex, arrival date, spayed/neutered status, chief complaint, and notes
Include all remaining incomplete tasks for each case in the PDF report, showing task names and their completion status

new_feature_requests.summary: Add PDF export feature for cases with downloadable report showing all case fields and remaining tasks
